content: from * around join with half_double_crochet to top of chain 3 128 row 16 chain 3 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet * 4 double_crochet in chain-3 space 5 times chain 1 2 double_crochet in each of the row 14 chain 7 counts as double_crochet and chain 4 decrease in next 3 double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to next 2 double_crochet chain 2 decrease in next 2 double_crochet 6 times chain 4 top of chain 3 208 double_crochet do not cut you will use this *double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 4 decrease in next 2 double_crochet chain 2 to attach the dream catcher to the hoop decrease in next 2 double_crochet 6 times chain 4 repeat from * finishing using the inside hoop attach the dream catcher by threading color e through the tapestry needle with the right side of the dream catcher facing you sew to hoop by bringing the yarn in front then up and over the hoop around the back and through a stitch of the dream catcher repeat this all the way around dream catcher should be pulled tight using your favorite method make 5 tassels sample made 2 each in color a and c and one in color b cord length is a total of 14 folded in half to equal 7 inches each tassel contains 16 strands 10 inches long folded in half to equal 5 inches the center tassel is attached first and the remaining tassels are attached approximately 4 inches from each other on both sides
